events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing the materials shortly.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on the candidate's skills and experience, focusing on software development and DevOps practices.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidateâ€™s process for the software engineer position and will reach out for initial screening shortly.
Completed the initial screening call with the candidate, discussing their experience with software development and their interest in DevOps responsibilities.
Candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm and provided detailed answers during the initial screening, showing strong motivation for the role.
A technical interview with the lead engineer has been scheduled for the candidate to further assess software development and DevOps skills.
The technical interview was successfully completed; the candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities and solid experience in relevant engineering technologies.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit and benefits with the candidate who passed the technical interview stage.
HR interview completed successfully; candidate expressed alignment with company values and showed strong interest in joining the engineering team.
An offer was officially proposed to the candidate reflecting their experience and the market standards for the engineering role.
Received positive feedback from the candidate accepting the offer and eager to start contributing to software development and DevOps projects.
Candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed their start date, excited to join the engineering team and take on new challenges.
The onboarding process has started with the candidate, including software environment setup and introductory meetings with the engineering team.
The hiring process is officially closed with the successful recruitment and onboarding of the new software engineer ready to contribute.
